title: Star Wars
filming_locations: Durango, Mexico
plot_simple: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

title: Finding Nemo
plot_simple: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Forrest Gump
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

title: American Beauty
filming_locations: 11388 Homedale Street, Brentwood, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
filming_locations: Bequia, St Vincent and the Grenadines
plot_simple: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
filming_locations: 5506 Atlas St, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
filming_locations: 123 Valentine Lane, Yonkers, New York, USA
plot_simple: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

title: Memento
filming_locations: Altadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
filming_locations: Borehamwood, Hertfordshire, England, UK
plot_simple: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

title: Gladiator
filming_locations: Ait Benhaddou, Ouarzazate, Morocco
plot_simple: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

title: Back to the Future
filming_locations: Santa Clarita, California, USA
plot_simple: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

title: Snatch.
filming_locations: Bethnal Green Town Hall, Bethnal Green, London, England, UK
plot_simple: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: Pretty Woman
filming_locations: Giorgio Beverly Hills - 273 North Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills, California, USA
plot_simple: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
filming_locations: Arrowtown Recreational Reserve, Arrowtown, Otago, New Zealand
plot_simple: A meek hobbit of The Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
filming_locations: Camperdown Studios, Camperdown Road, Miramar, Wellington, New Zealand
plot_simple: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
filming_locations: Camperdown Studios, Camperdown Road, Miramar, Wellington, New Zealand
plot_simple: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
filming_locations: Vicksburg, Mississippi, USA
plot_simple: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

title: Donnie Darko
filming_locations: Santa Clarita, California, USA
plot_simple: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

title: Lost in Translation
filming_locations: Heian Shrine, Kyoto, Japan
plot_simple: A faded movie star and a neglected young wife form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

title: The Dark Knight
filming_locations: Times Square, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
plot_simple: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.

title: Ocean's Eleven
filming_locations: 495 North Milwaukee Avenue, Chicago, Illinois, USA
plot_simple: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Minority Report
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

title: Sin City
filming_locations: Austin, Texas, USA
plot_simple: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

title: Amelia
filming_locations: Acadia University, Wolfville, Nova Scotia, Canada
plot_simple: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

title: Braveheart
filming_locations: Aonach Eagach, Highland, Scotland, UK
plot_simple: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier whom tried to rape her, a commoner begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron-fist.

title: The Godfather
filming_locations: 110 Longfellow Road, Staten Island, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: High Fidelity
filming_locations: Chicago, Illinois, USA
plot_simple: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

title: Batman Begins
filming_locations: Coalhouse Fort, East Tilbury, Essex, England, UK
plot_simple: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

title: Batman Begins
filming_locations: Coalhouse Fort, East Tilbury, Essex, England, UK
plot_simple: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
filming_locations: Clay County, West Virginia, USA
plot_simple: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: Fargo
filming_locations: Chanhassen Dinner Theatre, Chanhassen, Minnesota, USA
plot_simple: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
filming_locations: Santa Clarita, California, USA
plot_simple: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor is dead, and another T-101 must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator, the T-1000.

title: Jurassic Park
filming_locations: Blue Hole, Kaua'i, Hawaii, USA
plot_simple: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title:
Kill Bill Vol. 2: The Love Story
            "Kill Bill: Vol. 2"
filming_locations: Barstow, California, USA
plot_simple: The Bride continues her vengeful quest against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: Batman Forever
filming_locations: ARCO Refinery, Carson, California, USA
plot_simple: Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

title: Schindler's List
filming_locations: Auschwitz-Birkenau Concentration Camp, Oswiecim, Malopolskie, Poland
plot_simple: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: A Beautiful Mind
filming_locations: Bayonne, New Jersey, USA
plot_simple: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.

title: Erin Brockovich
filming_locations: Santa Ventura Studios, Ventura, California, USA
plot_simple: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

title: Fight Club
filming_locations: 421 W. Eighth Street, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

title: Apollo 13
filming_locations: Ambassador Hotel - 3400 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Three astronauts must devise a strategy to return to Earth safely after their spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage.

title: Dances with Wolves
filming_locations: Badlands National Park, Interior, South Dakota, USA
plot_simple: Lt. John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

title: Monsters, Inc.
plot_simple: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.

title: Titanic
filming_locations: Santa Clarita, California, USA
plot_simple: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat, expecting to be married to a rich claimant by her mother, falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
filming_locations: 7121 Lonzo Street, Tujunga, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A meek and alienated little boy finds a stranded extraterrestrial. He has to find the courage to defy the authorities to help the alien return to its home planet.

title: Independence Day
filming_locations: Santa Clarita, California, USA
plot_simple: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy. Fighting superior technology, Man's best weapon is the will to survive.

title: The Matrix
filming_locations: AON Tower, Kent Street, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
plot_simple: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
filming_locations: 16th Street, Oakland, California, USA
plot_simple: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. During this, Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

title: Men in Black
filming_locations: Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth.

title: The Usual Suspects
filming_locations: City Hall - 200 N. Spring Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Catch Me If You Can
filming_locations: 3077 East California Boulevard, Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr., who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.

title: Requiem for a Dream
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

title: Twister
filming_locations: Ames, Iowa, USA
plot_simple: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
filming_locations: London, England, UK
plot_simple: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
filming_locations: Oxford, Oxfordshire, England, UK
plot_simple: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.

title: Pulp Fiction
filming_locations: 1435 Flower Street, Glendale, California, USA
plot_simple: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Sixth Sense
filming_locations: Blue Bell, Pennsylvania, USA
plot_simple: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: V for Vendetta
filming_locations: Güterfelde, Stahnsdorf, Brandenburg, Germany
plot_simple: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as "V" uses guerrilla tactics to fight against his terrorist, totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.

title: Almost Famous
filming_locations: 1047 Maple St, Santa Monica, California, USA
plot_simple: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

title: Mrs. Doubtfire
filming_locations: 100 Embarcadero Street, San Francisco, California, USA
plot_simple: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

title: Seven Pounds
filming_locations: Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

title: Shrek
plot_simple: An ogre, in order to regain his swamp, travels along with an annoying donkey in order to bring a princess to a scheming lord, wishing himself King.

title: Shrek 2
plot_simple: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

title: Aladdin
plot_simple: Aladdin, a street urchin, accidentally meets Princess Jasmine, who is in the city undercover. They love each other, but she can only marry a prince.

title: The Mask
filming_locations: 6th Street Viaduct, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic super-hero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Saving Private Ryan
filming_locations: Calvados, France
plot_simple: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Toy Story
plot_simple: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
filming_locations: Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
plot_simple: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

title: Mission: Impossible II
filming_locations: Argyle Place, The Rocks, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
plot_simple: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"

title: The Departed
filming_locations: 12 Farnsworth Street, Boston, Massachusetts, USA
plot_simple: An undercover state cop who has infiltrated an Irish gang and a mole in the police force working for the same mob race to track down and identify each other before being exposed to the enemy, after both sides realize their outfit has a rat.

title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
filming_locations: 72nd Street, Broadway, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Meet the Parents
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

title: Speed
filming_locations: Ballerina Clown - 255 Main Street, Venice, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
filming_locations: Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA
plot_simple: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
filming_locations: Buttercup Valley, California, USA
plot_simple: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the Second Death Star, while Luke Skywalker tries to bring his father back to the Light Side of the Force.

title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
filming_locations: Chott el Djerid, Nefta, Tunisia
plot_simple: Ten years later, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé, while Obi-Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Princess and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

title: Traffic
filming_locations: A-1 Self Storage, 1190-B W. Morena Boulevard, San Diego, California, USA
plot_simple: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is an addict.

title: The Patriot
filming_locations: Botany Bay Plantation - 7510 Botany Bay Road, Edisto Island, South Carolina, USA
plot_simple: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Stargate
filming_locations: Ballroom, Park Plaza Hotel - 607 S. Park View Street, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

title: The Bourne Identity
filming_locations: Avenue Kleber, Paris 8, Paris, France
plot_simple: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and without memory, then races to elude assassins and recover from amnesia.

title: The Bourne Supremacy
filming_locations: Alexanderplatz, Mitte, Berlin, Germany
plot_simple: When Jason Bourne is framed for a botched CIA operation he is forced to take up his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
filming_locations: Compton Apartments - Washington Avenue, Miami, Florida, USA
plot_simple: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of a missing dolphin mascot of a football team.

title: Charlie's Angels
filming_locations: 7121 Lonzo Street, Tujunga, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

title: The Fugitive
filming_locations: 11219 S St Lawrence Ave, Chicago, Illinois, USA
plot_simple: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.

title: Chicken Run
plot_simple: Chicken Run is a comedy escape drama with a touch of passion set on a sinister Yorks chicken farm in 1950's England

title: Cast Away
filming_locations: Brownstone Street, Backlot, Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Dumb & Dumber
filming_locations: Aspen, Colorado, USA
plot_simple: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

title: The Lion King
plot_simple: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.

title: Clear and Present Danger
filming_locations: Cuernavaca, Morelos, Mexico
plot_simple: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

title: The Rock
filming_locations: Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA
plot_simple: A renegade general and his group of U.S. Marines take over Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco Bay with biological weapons. A chemical weapons specialist and the only man to have ever escaped from the Rock attempt to prevent chaos.

title: The Incredibles
plot_simple: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: Beauty and the Beast
filming_locations: Walt Disney Feature Animation - 500 S. Buena Vista Street, Burbank, California, USA
plot_simple: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.
